description:
Modern Music Server and Streamer compatible with Subsonic/Airsonic


Changelog
Bug fixes
-  fix(insights): get Windows version (@deluan)
-  fix(server): change log level for some last.fm warnings (@deluan)
-  fix(ui): update Español, Français, Svenska translations from POEditor (#3576) (@deluan)
-  fix(ui): update Hungarian translation (#3574) (@ChekeredList71)
Build process updates
-  build(ci): fix release version label and package names (#3573) (@deluan)
-  build(poeditor): change commit message for translation update PRs (@deluan)
Other work
-  chore: add PikaPods to release notes (@deluan)
Full Changelog: https://github.com/navidrome/navidrome/compare/v0.54.1...v0.54.2Helping out
This release is only possible thanks to the support of some awesome people!Want to be one of them?
You can sponsor, pay me a Ko-fi, or contribute with code.Where to go next?

- Host Navidrome on PikaPods for a simple cloud solution.
- Reach out on Discord, Reddit and Twitter!
